welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yatagan, Turkey! This charming town is known for its rich history, wonderful local cuisine, and stunning natural landscape. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights at Milas-Bodrum Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights at Milas-Bodrum Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Imsik Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Imsik Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
